snippet: The court on Friday allowed an auction house to go forward with the sale of 25 sacred Hopi Indian artifacts despite a legal battle initiated by the Native American tribe.
abstract: The court on Friday allowed an auction house to go forward with the sale of 25 sacred Hopi Indian artifacts despite a legal battle initiated by the Native American tribe.

headline.main: French Court Allows Auction of Hopi Artifacts to Proceed
headline.print_headline: French Court Allows Auction of Hopi Artifacts to Proceed
